pageProduct.name: Avene SPF 50+ Face and Body Lotion 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ is a very high protection and water resistant sunscreen for face and body which has been especially formulated with a minimum of chemical filters to respect sensitive skin. It covers a broad spectrum UVB-UVA protection by using an exclusive combination of active ingredients. The non-greasy texture is quickly absorbed by the skin for even and invisible protection.

Avene Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ can help preventing solar keratosis, sunspots and premature skin ageing. It also may assist in preventing some skin cancers.

Avene Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ benefits from the exclusive SunSitive Protection formula, result of Pierre Fabre Group’s Research:

- Photoprotective system: works in synergy to offer a formulation with a minimum of chemical filters.

- Pre-tocopheryl: Formulated with a photostable Vitamin E precursor.

- Very rich in Avene Thermal Spring Water.

Paraben free. Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.

Ingredients

Water (Avene Thermal Spring Water). Octocrylene. Dicaprylyl Ether. Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol [Nano]. Cyclopentasiloxane. Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane . Cetearyl Isononanoate. Glycerin. Titanium Dioxide [Nano]. Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine. C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate. Diisopropyl Adipate. Potassium Cetyl Phosphate. Stearyl Alcohol. Cyclohexasiloxane. Vp/Eicosene Copolymer. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Caprylyl Glycol. Decyl Glucoside. Dimethicone. Disodium Edta. Fragrance (Parfum). Glyceryl Behenate. Glyceryl Dibehenate. Propylene Glycol. Silica. Sorbic Acid. Tocopherol. Tocopheryl Glucoside. Tribehenin. Xanthan Gum.

Directions

Apply generously and evenly 20 minutes prior to sun exposure. Reapply after:

- 40 minutes of swimming or sweating

- Immediately after towel drying

- At least every 2 hours

Storage conditions: store below 30C.
